title: Did Meek Mill Deserve it? / Miko Grimes Interview and more
itunes:title: Did Meek Mill Deserve it? / Miko Grimes Interview and more
description:
Today on the show, after headlines stated that Meek Mill is sentenced to 2- 4 years in jail we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners disagreed or agreed on the judges decision. Moreover, we had Baller's Wife Miko Grimes come by the show, and lets just say she may have sparked up some conflict when it comes to the NFL. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that killed his son for being gay. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
